channel.title: Pleb Tunes by Brrreadfan
channel.itunes:author: Brrreadfan
channel.description: Just a Bitcoin pleb butchering your favourite songs!
channel.generator: Handcrafted from Demu Open Source Template v0.1.1

image.title: My Demu Album
image.description: Demu Emu on My Demu Album art

item.title: The Misbits - Die, Die My Dollar
item.description:
Die, die, die my Dollar

Don’t shudder at Proof of Work

Die, die, die my Dollar

Just print your pretty lies

I’m not feeding you again

And no-one’s feeding you in hell

Don’t cry for Fiat baby

Our future's built on orange blocks

Don’t cry for Fiat baby

We plant a seed and just let it grow

Don’t cry for Fiat baby

And we know it is in our power

Don’t cry for Fiat baby

Better gold for a better world

Don’t cry for Fiat baby

And now our life gains so much more

Don’t cry for Fiat baby

Die, die, die my Dollar

Don’t shudder at Proof of Work

Die, die, die my Dollar

Just shut your greedy mouth

I’m not feeding you again

And no-one’s feeding you in hell

Dollar die! Dollar die!

Go make some Bitcoin babies!

item.title: NakamoTool - Right In Two
item.description:
Austrians on the sidelinemuzzled and abused

Why did Keynesians give these humans Fiat?

Now they’re all confused

Don’t these talking monkeys know

they bleed themselves and snuff each other out?

Undermine their golden time for silly money,

boom-and-bust is bound to divide it

Right in two

Austrians on the sideline

baffled and amused

Someone blessed them all with Bitcoin

And this is what they choose?

Monkey printing money, killing monkey,

no more peace no common ground

Silly monkeys,

Give them crumbs, they forge a state

and governments are bound to divide them

Right in two

Right in two Monkey printing money, killing monkey, Won’t this spiral turn around? Clever monkeys, Cypherpunks build bottom up, Make tyrants topple down How they’ve survived so misguided without Satoshi? Abundance hunting creatures shall not squander all their energy But grow with every halving conscious of their fleeting time here Cut the mining reward right in two Cut the mining reward right in two Cut the mining reward right in two Cut the mining reward right in two Mine, verify, store the sun, clear the sky They mine, verify, sow the seeds for their heirs They mine, verify, no more blood, for more love They mine, verify, world is decentralizing Keynesians on the sideline again Banished by deflation and reason Keynesians on the sideline again Finally all those Fiat wars will end Cut the mining reward right in two Cut the mining reward right in two Cut the mining reward right in two Right in two Right in two
